name: When did
body:
That is a great question! **When did** is a simple never ending stopwatch to help me answer questions like those. Name and start a timer and it will tell you how many years, days, hours, and minutes ago that you did that thing.

![screenshot](http://cl.ly/image/213r3V3D3n1e/human-readable-distance-in-time.gif)

This application is [an exercise in product design and implementation](https://github.com/jonmagic/product/blob/master/when_did/README.md).

## Support

If you have questions please [file an issue](https://github.com/when-apps/whendid-ios/issues/new) or [email me](mailto:jonmagic@gmail.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
